<title level="1" pfs="">[Bosun](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3600)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

A ship's boatswain, or bosun, leads the deckhands who maintain the ship.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 18

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Bosun.webp" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 3">[Bosun](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3600)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=627" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=628" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [NPC Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=236) pg. 147

**Perception** +8

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=34) +9, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) +9, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=40) +9, [Sailing Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=41) +11

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +4

**Con** +1

**Int** +0

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +2
</row>

**Items**
[Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3), naval pike (functions as a [spear](/Weapons.aspx?ID=365))

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 18 

**Fort** +6 

**Ref** +11 

**Will** +8 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 45

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +13 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+5 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +13 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)),
**Damage** 1d4+5 bludgeoning

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
naval pike +11,
**Damage** 1d6+5 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
naval pike +13 ([thrown 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d6+5 piercing

**Bosun's Command** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16), [Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Linguistic](/Traits.aspx?ID=101), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) **Frequency** once per round; **Effect** The bosun orders an ally to attack or to get in position. Until the end of the ally's next turn, they gain the bosun's choice of a +2 status bonus to attack rolls or a +10-foot status bonus to their Speeds.

**Pike and Strike** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The bosun makes a melee Strike with their naval pike. If this Strike hits, the bosun can either [move](/Rules.aspx?ID=451) the target 5 feet within the pike's reach or make a fist Strike against the target without increasing their multiple attack penalty until after the fist Strike.

</column>

<aside>
<title level="2" noclass="true" icon="">Shipboard Spells</title>

A bosun with magical training can exchange Pike and Strike for the following spells.

 **Primal Prepared Spells** DC 18, attack +10; **1st** [_ant haul_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1442), [_gentle landing_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1542), [_hydraulic push_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1561); **Cantrips (1st)** [_electric arc_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1509), [_guidance_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1549), [_know the way_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1582), [_light_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1585), [_sigil_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1673)
</aside>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-549" />
name: Bosun
